alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Hamilton; McMinn; Meigs; West Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 29 at 7:54PM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Bradley, southwestern Meigs, southwestern McMinn and Hamilton Counties through 930 PM EST... At 854 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Dayton to Lakesite to near Lookout Mountain. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chattanooga, Cleveland, Rossville, Lakesite, Charleston, Ridgeside, South Cleveland, Harrison, East Cleveland and Wildwood Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EST for east Tennessee.

area.areaDesc: Bradley; Hamilton; McMinn; Meigs; West Polk
